column4: well nice looking mobo but you should check with gnu for what hardware can be currently supported with a free bios that we have some control over.
just because it looks good on the outside doesn't mean it is good on the inside
if you cannot control it with completely free software...you will be in trouble
and a lot of people are already buying up all the old dvd hardware because of the talk of putting DRM shit in those future products as well
